backFields.label: Certificate Details
backFields.value:
Certificate ID: LIFT-8472-9103
Holder: Raul Hernandez
Series: 2025Q4
Issue Date: 2024-03-15
Maturity Date: 2029-03-15 (60 months)

Maturity Value: $3,780 USD
Deposited to Date: $250
Projected Growth: 20%

backFields.label: Engagement Phase
backFields.value:
◉◉◉○○ Phase 1 of 5: Engagement

You're in the Engagement phase of your LIFT Certificate journey. As you deepen your participation, you'll progress through:

Engagement → Residency → Anchorship

Each phase unlocks additional benefits, access to private placements, and deeper community involvement.

backFields.label: Your Selected Priorities
backFields.value:
You've opted in to receive updates and invitations related to:

• Community Living
• Resilient Infrastructure
• Food & Farming

You'll receive impact announcements, private placement opportunities, and event invitations aligned with these priorities.

backFields.label: Issuer Hierarchy
backFields.value:
Your LIFT Certificate is part of a multi-layered capital structure:

LocalFund → Capitol Fund → Exchange Reserve → LIFT Trust

• LocalFund: Community-facing brand
• Capitol Fund: Regional capital pool
• Exchange Reserve: Meta-ledger operator
• LIFT Trust: Delaware Statutory Trust (DST) series structure

backFields.label: Certificate Verification
backFields.value:
Verify authenticity and view your complete certificate details:

https://exchangereserve.netlify.app/verify/LIFT-8472-9103

Scan the QR code on the front or visit the link above. This pass updates automatically via the Exchange Reserve meta-ledger.

backFields.label: Upcoming Events
backFields.value:
As a LIFT Certificate holder, you have access to exclusive Impact Briefings and community events. You'll receive geofenced notifications when events are nearby.

Next Event: Capitol Fund Quarterly Update
Date: November 15, 2025
Location: Bell Tower Hall, Frederick MD

backFields.label: Contact & Support
backFields.value:
Questions about your certificate?

Email: hello@exchangereserve.org

backFields.label: Trust Disclosures
backFields.value:
This certificate represents participation in a regenerative capital framework. It is not a traditional security or investment product. Maturity values are projections based on Capitol Fund performance and impact metrics.

Holders may qualify for priority access to future offerings based on engagement phase and contribution history. Geographic restrictions may apply.

For complete terms, visit: https://exchangereserve.netlify.app/terms/lift-2025q4

locations.relevantText: Holder briefing at Bell Tower Hall - Capitol Fund Quarterly Update
